# Overview
Summarise lm.meta simulation results

```{r setup, echo = FALSE}                                           
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath("../"))
# setwd("simulation/")
```
```{r setup2, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
for(i.function in list.files("functions/", full.names = TRUE)) {
  source(i.function)
}
setup()
dir_output <- "results/lm.meta/"
dir.create(dir_output, recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = TRUE)
```

```{r load data for summary}
load(paste0(dir_output, "tb_sim.RData"))
load(paste0(dir_output, "evaluate_before.RData"))
load(paste0(dir_output, "evaluate_after.RData"))
```

```{r arrange parameters}
tb_sim <- tb_sim %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(effect_exposure = effectSize %>% 
                  purrr::map_dbl("exposure"),
                # effect_batch = effectSize %>% 
                #   purrr::map_dbl("batch"),
                effect_batch = batch_sd,
                exposure_type = metadata_type %>% 
                  purrr::map_chr("exposure") %>% 
                  dplyr::recode("factor" = "discrete",
                                "numeric" = "continuous") %>% 
                  factor(levels = c("discrete", "continuous")),
                i = 1:n()) %>% 
  dplyr::select(-`1:n()`)

tb_sim <- tb_sim %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(effect_exposure, effect_batch, exposure_type,
                  nBatch, nSample, nMicrobe, spikeMicrobes) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(i_rep = i[1])

tb_sim <- tb_sim %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(dplyr::desc(nSample), nBatch) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(nSample_nBatch = paste0("nSample = ", nSample, ", ",
                                        "nBatch = ", nBatch) %>% 
                  factor(levels = unique(.)))

tb_sim <- tb_sim %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(nMicrobe, spikeMicrobes) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(nMicrobe_percSpike = paste0("nFeature = ", nMicrobe, ", ",
                                            spikeMicrobes*100, "% spiked") %>% 
                  factor(levels = unique(.)))


tb_sim <- tb_sim %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(i) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(features_TP = spikein.mt[[1]] %>% 
                  dplyr::filter(!(metadata %in% (1:(2*nBatch)))) %>% 
                  dplyr::pull(feature) %>% 
                  unique() %>% 
                  list(),
                logical_TP = list((1:nMicrobe) %in% features_TP[[1]]))

#sanity check
tb_sim %>%
  dplyr::mutate(n_feature_TP_true = logical_TP %>%
                  purrr::map_dbl(sum),
                n_feature_TP_theory = nMicrobe * spikeMicrobes *
                  ifelse(exposure_type == "discrete", 4, 1)) %>%
  dplyr::filter(exposure_type == "continuous") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = n_feature_TP_true, n_feature_TP_theory)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r sanity check}
tb_R2 <- list(results, results_correct) %>% 
  purrr::map2_dfr(names(colors_simulation_unsupervised), 
                  ~ .x %>% 
                    purrr::imap_dfr(~ data.frame(R2_exposure = .x$R2["exposure"],
                                                 R2_batch = .x$R2["batch"],
                                                 i = .y)) %>% 
                    data.frame(Data = .y)) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(Data = factor(Data, levels = names(colors_simulation_unsupervised)))

ps_R2_batch <- c("discrete", "continuous") %>% 
  purrr::map(function(i_exposure) {
    tb_R2 %>% 
      dplyr::left_join(tb_sim, by = "i") %>% 
      dplyr::filter(exposure_type == i_exposure) %>%
      dplyr::filter(!(effect_batch == 0 & Data == "MMUPHin corrected")) %>% 
      ggplot(aes(x = as.factor(effect_exposure), y = R2_batch, 
                 alpha = as.factor(effect_batch),
                 color = Data)) +
      geom_boxplot() +
      facet_grid(nSample_nBatch ~ nMicrobe_percSpike) +
      ggtitle(paste0("Exposure is ", i_exposure)) +
      scale_color_manual(values = colors_simulation_unsupervised)
  })
cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = ps_R2_batch, nrow = 1) %>% 
  ggsave(filename = paste0(dir_output, "R2_batch.pdf"), ., width = 30, height = 15)
ps_R2_exposure <- c("discrete", "continuous") %>% 
  purrr::map(function(i_exposure) {
    tb_R2 %>% 
      dplyr::left_join(tb_sim, by = "i") %>% 
      dplyr::filter(exposure_type == i_exposure) %>%
      dplyr::filter(!(effect_batch == 0 & Data == "MMUPHin corrected")) %>% 
      ggplot(aes(x = as.factor(effect_exposure), y = R2_exposure, 
                 alpha = as.factor(effect_batch),
                 color = Data)) +
      geom_boxplot() +
      facet_grid(nSample_nBatch ~ nMicrobe_percSpike) +
      ggtitle(paste0("Exposure is ", i_exposure)) +
      scale_color_manual(values = colors_simulation_unsupervised)
  })
cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = ps_R2_exposure, nrow = 1) %>% 
  ggsave(filename = paste0(dir_output, "R2_exposure.pdf"), ., width = 30, height = 10)
```

```{r summarise results and plot}
tb_results <- tibble::tibble(results = results, Data = "Original", 
                             i = 1:nrow(tb_sim)) %>% 
  rbind(tibble::tibble(results = results_correct, Data = "MMUPHin corrected", 
                       i = 1:nrow(tb_sim))) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(Data = factor(Data, levels = c("Original", "MMUPHin corrected")))

tb_summarise_statistics <- c("MMUPHin", "naive") %>% 
  purrr::map_dfr(function(model) {
    tb_results %>% 
      dplyr::left_join(tb_sim, by = "i") %>% 
      dplyr::group_by(1:n()) %>% 
      dplyr::mutate(power = sum(logical_TP[[1]] & 
                                  results[[1]][[model]]$pval < 0.05, 
                                na.rm = TRUE) / 
                      sum(logical_TP[[1]]),
                    FPR = sum(!logical_TP[[1]] & 
                                results[[1]][[model]]$pval < 0.05, 
                              na.rm = TRUE) / 
                      sum(!logical_TP[[1]]),
                    AUC = pROC::auc(response = logical_TP[[1]],
                                    predictor = 1- results[[1]][[model]]$pval) %>% 
                      as.numeric()
      ) %>% 
      dplyr::mutate(model = factor(model, levels = c("MMUPHin", "naive")))
  })

p_power <- tb_summarise_statistics %>% 
  # dplyr::filter(effect_batch == 5) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(i_rep, model, Data) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(power_mean = mean(power),
                power_sd = sd(power)) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(rep == 1) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = effect_exposure,
             y = power_mean,
             color = model,
             shape = as.factor(effect_batch))) +
  geom_point(position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
  geom_line(aes(linetype = as.factor(effect_batch))) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = power_mean - power_sd,
                    ymax = power_mean + power_sd),
                position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
  facet_grid(exposure_type ~ Data)
ggsave(filename = paste0(dir_output, "power_", 
                         metadata_type, ".pdf"), p_power, width = 20, height = 10)

p_FPR <- tb_summarise_statistics %>% 
  dplyr::filter(effect_batch == 5) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(i_rep, model, Data) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(FPR_mean = mean(FPR),
                FPR_sd = sd(FPR)) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(rep == 1) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = effect_exposure,
             y = FPR_mean,
             color = model,
             shape = as.factor(effect_batch))) +
  geom_point(position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
  geom_line(aes(linetype = as.factor(effect_batch))) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = FPR_mean - FPR_sd,
                    ymax = FPR_mean + FPR_sd),
                position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
  facet_grid(exposure_type ~ Data)
ggsave(filename = paste0(dir_output, "power_", 
                         metadata_type, ".pdf"), p_power, width = 20, height = 10)
p_AUC <- tb_summarise_statistics %>% 
  dplyr::filter(Data == "Original", exposure_type == "continuous", effect_batch == 5) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(i_rep, model) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(AUC_mean = mean(AUC),
                AUC_sd = sd(AUC)) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup() %>% 
  dplyr::filter(rep == 1) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = effect_exposure,
             y = AUC_mean,
             color = model,
             shape = as.factor(effect_batch))) +
  geom_point(position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
  geom_line(aes(linetype = as.factor(effect_batch))) +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = AUC_mean - AUC_sd,
                    ymax = AUC_mean + AUC_sd),
                position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
  facet_grid(nSample_nBatch ~ nMicrobe_percSpike)
```

```{r check individual studies}
tb_summarise_statistics %>% 
  dplyr::filter(effect_batch == 5,
                effect_exposure == 5,
                exposure_type == "discrete",
                Data == "Original") %>% 
  dplyr::select(i, rep, power, FPR, model) %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(i)
is <- tb_summarise_statistics %>% 
  dplyr::filter(effect_batch == 5,
                effect_exposure == 5,
                exposure_type == "discrete",
                Data == "Original") %>% 
  dplyr::select(i, rep, power, FPR, model) %>% 
  extract2("i") %>% unique()
for(i in is) {
  mat_otu <- read.table(paste0("results/lm.meta/sparseDOSSA_sets/", i, ".tsv"),
                        sep = "\t", header = TRUE, row.names = 1) %>% as.matrix
  results_diff <- tb_sim$logical_TP[[i]] &
    results[[i]]$MMUPHin$pval > 0.05 &
    results[[i]]$naive$pval < 0.05
  mat_otu <- mat_otu %>% 
    apply(2, MMUPHin:::tss)
  tb_long <- mat_otu %>% 
    as.data.frame() %>% 
    tibble::rownames_to_column("Feature") %>% 
    tidyr::gather(key=Sample, value=RA, -Feature) %>% 
    dplyr::left_join(tb_sim$df_metadata[[i]] %>% 
                       tibble::rownames_to_column("Sample"),
                     by = "Sample") %>% 
    dplyr::mutate(feature_TP = Feature %in% paste0("Feature", (1:200)[results_diff]))
  
  plots <- tb_long %>% 
    dplyr::filter(feature_TP) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = batch, y = RA, color = exposure)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    facet_wrap(~Feature)
}
tb_sim$spikein.mt[[i]] %>% dplyr::filter(feature == 57)
tb_sim[i, ]$features_TP
tb_sim[i, ]$df_metadata[[1]]$batch
test <- results[[i]]$MMUPHin %>% dplyr::filter(tb_sim[i, ]$logical_TP[[1]])
test_naive <- results[[i]]$naive %>% dplyr::filter(tb_sim[i, ]$logical_TP[[1]])
```
